information: MANUFACTURE TROYENNE DE MAROQUINERIE provides contract luxury leatherwork production services. We are based in Troyes, in the Champagne region of France. Our decision to locate in this region was motived as much by the quality of life it offers our craftspeople as by its strategic geographical situation. Our facility is devoted to the production of luxury leather bags and wallets on behalf of a number of high-end brands. Working on behalf of our clients, we develop and perfect bags and other small leatherwork items. We create templates, prototyping and production. We develop all types of products, using Mozart software. We work with all types of leathers, including calf, goat, sheep, lizard, ostrich, crocodile and other high quality materials. We are able to produce items in small and medium production runs.
